transcript:
Customer: [Music]
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan Anshu ji baat kar rahe hain sir, AR visible se aapki.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Anshu ji, Anshu ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Anshu ji good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha main senior manager IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Mast sir, apna bataiye.
Executive: Badhiya badhiya sir, actually sir maine call kiya tha na, aapne sir ek concern raise kiya tha sir, hamare side customer care pe aapne kal call kiya tha.
Executive: To wohi hum jaanna cha rahe the sir, ki kya issue aa raha hai sir bataiye kya help kar sakte hain.
Customer: Sir mujhe na ye, ye kya bolte hain mujhe idhar, idhar ka lead proper nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Aur idhar ka matlab jaise sir, jaise Muzaffarpur.
Customer: Muzaffarpur Bihar.
Customer: Nahi Muzaffarpur Bihar ka to GST mein pehle bhi bata rakha tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Mera business hai Ahmedabad mein aur Pune mein.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To matlab ye dono jagah proper lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: To aap sir filter wagera sir use kar rahe hain sir, filter wagera location ka jo hum filter dete hain sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hmm hmm, kya dikkat aa raha hai matlab Ahmedabad aur Pune mainly aap target karte ho aap keh rahe ho sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: To ek minute main check bhi kar leta hu sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kyunki hum location ka filter dete hain, I hope location filter aap use bhi karte honge sir, hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To jo bhi agar location filter use karne ke baad sir jo bhi buyleads hamare paas available honge na woh definitely aapko dikhegi sir, aisa nahi ki woh aapko nahi dikhegi sir. Haan agar sold out ho jati hai sir to phir woh aapko past transaction mein dikhta hai sir.
Executive: To jaise main check kar raha tha sir ki abhi Ahmedabad Gujarat ka hi check kar raha tha to 13 hours ago sir 13 ghanta pehle bird netting service ka bhi ek buylead hamare paas post hui thi sir.
Executive: Ek stainless steel grill ka 14 ghanta pehle bhi aaya hua hai sir Ahmedabad Gujarat se hi sir, ye do buylead mujhe Ahmedabad Gujarat ki dikh rahi hai sir.
Executive: Aap open kar sakte ho agar IndiaMART ka seller aap kaise use karte hain application se karte hain ya phir laptop wagera se karte hain.
Customer: Main phone se hi karta hu.
Executive: Agar aapke paas ab IndiaMART ka application phone mein available hai sir to aap open karke bhi check kar sakte hain sir location filter laga ke aap Ahmedabad Gujarat mein dekh.
Customer: Main dekh lunga woh dusre phone mein pada hai.
Executive: Haan haan aap check kar lijiyega, saath hi saath aapne dusra location Pune ka bataya hai hai na sir?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Pune ka bhi check kar leta hu sir.
Executive: Pune location se sir mosquito wire mesh roll isme deal karte hain aap?
Customer: Nahi mosquito nahi.
Executive: To ek ye aapka show ho raha tha to isko not relevant aap mark kar dijiyega.
Executive: Pata hai na sir not relevant kaise mark karte hain?
Customer: Haan haan woh to pata hai.
Executive: Haan kyunki right side mein aapko delete button dikhta hoga sir to us pe aap click karke apna feedback de dijiyega ki is product mein aap deal nahi karte hain hai na sir.
Executive: Saath hi saath mujhe abhi Pune se to sir bas ek hi yahi buylead abhi aapka show ho raha tha sir iske alawa koi buylead hamare paas abhi approve nahi hui hai.
Executive: Aur aisa nahi hai ki agar approve hogi to woh dikhegi nahi sir, jo bhi buyleads hamare portal mein available honge chahe Pune location se ho chahe Ahmedabad location se ho sir woh definitely aapko dikhega sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan baki ye cheez main puch raha tha sir ki jaise October mahine mein sir do calls aapke paas aayi thi sir aapne dono ke dono call aapne miss kiya tha sir.
Customer: Hmm woh kuch dikkate thi tabiyat wagera kharab thi.
Executive: Bilkul theek hai.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Ek suggestion hoga sir ki agar aap possible ho na agar koi aapka employee ho office ka ya phir aap kisi member ko add karna chahte hain na to agar maan lijiye kisi din aap busy rehte ho sir to aap unka bhi number add kar sakte hain sir so that woh buyer ka call ka response sir real time mein kar sake hai na sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kyunki agar hota hai na sir real time mein buyer se baat hota hai sir to ek opportunity waha pe hoti hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Saath hi saath main kuch product bhi aapka check kar raha tha sir jaise aapka nylon coated invisible safety grill ho gaya sir is product ke aapne images wagera add nahi kiya sirf video aapne add kiya hua hai sir.
Customer: Haan woh.
Executive: Images bhi hai videos bhi hai haan.
Executive: Dusra hai balcony grill kya sorry sir.
Customer: Woh to main kar lunga abhi thodi woh issue isliye nahi kar raha.
Executive: Haan haan saath hi saath aapka balcony grill design ho gaya sir is product ka bhi score kaafi kam hai matlab sirf aapne product ka naam likh ke rakha hua hai SS balcony grill ho gaya sir isme na kuch bhi details wagera aapne mention nahi kiya hua hai sir.
Executive: Ek mera suggestion hoga sir ki hum kya karte hain na sir aapko bhi pata hai sir ki jitna achha hum product ka detail mention karenge na sir buyer ko bhi sir utna achha aapka product line ke bare mein pata chalega sir hai na to hamara ek suggestion hota hai sir ki please jitna achha ho sake jaise SS balcony grill ho gaya iska images wagera ho gaya specification wagera ho gaya balcony grill design ka ho gaya sir invisible safety grill wagera ka ho gaya sir inke maximum jitna jyada aap din put up kar sakte ho details sir aap jarur pick up kijiye theek hai. Koi bhi doubt koi bhi issue hota hai aap mujhe isi number pe call kar sakte hain theek hai na sir. Baki aap filter laga ke use kijiye sir mera number aap save kar lijiyega ya to phir aap apna account manager ka number jo Avneesh aapka account handle karta hai na unka I hope aapne number save kar rakha hoga hai na sir.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Koi bhi problem hota hai sir aap hume connect kijiye definitely hum aapka help karenge theek hai.
Customer: Okay sir okay.
Executive: Haan baki Anshu sir kya hota hai na jab bhi aap hamare customer care pe call karte ho na sir to aapke regarding sir ek concern raise ho jata hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan kya dikkate aa gayi ye inko.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul sir.
Executive: To agar abhi aapka permission ho to sir main usko close kar sakta hu sir.
Customer: Haan sir close kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai hamara jo discussion hua hai na sir uske regarding ek feedback jayega sir aapke mail pe please apna feedback jarur share kijiyega aur koi bhi issue hota hai sir aap mera number save kar lijiye ya aap apne account manager ko definitely call kar lijiyega theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay thank you sir have a nice day sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving proper leads for Ahmedabad and Pune.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the locations and confirmed buyleads.

- Advised to mark irrelevant leads as 'not relevant'.

- Suggested adding employee number for call response.

- Suggested improving product details for better visibility.

- Agreed to close the raised concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check leads in the application.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location filter, product details, customer care
